description:
Kaito never asked for glory. Training with his friends at the Phoenix Gym was all he needed, an oasis of strength and loyalty in the heart of Dawn City, a place consumed by chaos and greed. But when the ruthless "Kuro Zaibatsu" kidnaps Aya, their world is shattered. In this moment... Kaito’s fight truly begins.

With Dagon, Tejo, and Mika, they must battle their way through enemy strongholds in a desperate mission to save her.
With every fight the Phoenix Gym crew grows stronger, standing against impossible odds to free Aya and bring down the corporation’s sinister plans.

Your fingers are your weapons.
Your timing is your shield.

Six circles appear at the corners and sides of the screen.
Press the matching buttons to hit the correct circles, striking with precision, dodging incoming blows, and surviving the onslaught.

Press when the circle is blue to unleash your attacks.
Slip up on a red circle and the enemy will make you pay.

Every fight is a test of speed, focus, and pure reflex.


Game Modes

-Story Mode:
Experience Kaito and the Phoenix Gym’s struggle to rescue Aya from the clutches of Kuro Zaibatsu.
Each battle uncovers more of the story, each victory bringing you closer to a very unsettling truth.

-Ranked Trial:
Prove Yourself! Enter the gauntlet of three random fights in a row. Your rank determines the difficulty of your next challenge.
The higher you climb, the harder the game pushes back. Try to reach the maximum rank possible unlocking insanely difficult fights.
Perfect to show your fighting skills to your friends! 

-Custom Mode:
Take control by adjusting enemy speed, health, and damage.
Replay your favorite fights, sharpen your skills, or push yourself to the edge of endurance.


Reflex driven combat that rewards perfect timing.
Easy to learn, extremely hard to master. Endless replayability with custom fights and the ranked trial mode.
